comment.language: For the Commemoration of St. John Kame

text.language: Apic~yoinoufi sws e~bol: n~te pektoubo etj/k e~bol: nem peka~moni sa e~bol: peniwt abba Iwann/c <ame.
The incense of your, perfect purity has spread, and your eternal guidance, our father Abba John Kame.

language.div: Dupa kemurnianmu yang sempurna telah tersebar, / dan bimbinganmu yang abadi, / ya bapa kami Abba Yohanes Kame.

text.language: فاح بخور طهارتك الكاملة وتمسكك الى التمام ياأبانا القديس أنبا يؤانس كاما.
Anicovoc swlem e~rof: au,oh e~pekbioc etcwtp: je e~bol hiten pektoubo: nem tekparyenia etoi n~ata[ni.
The elders have smelled it, and were envious of your chosen zeal, for through your purity, and your spotless virginity.

language.div: Para penatua menciumnya / dan iri akan semangat sucimu / sebab melalui kemurnianmu / dan keperawananmu yang tak bercela.

text.language: فاشتمه الحكماء وغاروا لسيرتك المختارة لأن من قبل طهارتك وبتوليتك التى بلا عيب.
APo#c# viri n~oubw n~a~loli: acerq/ibi e~pekman~selet: oum/ini efouwnh efermeyre: e~pektoubo n~aggelikon.
The Lord grew a vine, and it overshadowed your chamber, as a sign it revealed, your angelic purity.

language.div: Tuhan menumbuhkan pohon anggur, / dan menaungi kamarmu, / sebagai tanda itu nyatakan, / kemurnianmu yang seperti malaikat.

text.language: أزهر الرب كرمةً وظللت على خدرك علامة ظاهرة تشهد لطهارتك الملائكية.
Pekerv~meui~ ettai/out: nem tekc~himi m~paryenoc: ]selet n~te P,#c#: afcwr e~bol qen pikocmoc t/rf.
Your honored fame, and that of your celibate wife, the bride of Christ, spread throughout the whole earth.

language.div: Nama harummu / dan istrimu yang perawan / mempelai Kristus / tersebar ke seluruh bumi.

text.language: تذكارك المكرم مع أمرأتك البتول عروس المسيح شاع فى كل العالم.
Eybe vai aui~ harok: n~je n/etkw] n~ca Po#c#: w~ piou/b m~mane~cwou: n~te pio~hi n~te P,#c#.
Therefore those who seek the Lord, came unto you, O priest and shepherd, of the flock of Christ.

language.div: Maka semua yang mencari Tuhan / datang padamu / hai imam dan gembala / kawanan Kristus.

text.language: من أجل هذا أتى اليك طالبو الرب أيها الكاهن الراعى قطيع المسيح.
Ak]c~bw nwou n~]metmona,oc: kata t~taxic n~niaggeloc: akenou e~p~swi n~ouyucia~ ecs/p: nahren V] Viwt.
You taught them monasticism, according to the angelic rites, you lifted up a pleasant sacrifice, before God the Father.

language.div: Engkau ajar mereka kehidupan monastik / sesuai aturan para malaikat / kau persembahkan kurban harum / di hadapan Allah Bapa.

text.language: وعلمتهم الرهبنة كطقس الملائكة وأصعدتهم ذبيحة مقبولة أمام الله الآب.
Ak[i n~hantaio~ nem han,~lom: e~bol hiten p~ouro P,#c#: akounof nem n/e#y#u#: n~h~r/i qen tefmetouro.
You received honor and crowns, before Christ the King, you rejoiced with the saints, in His kingdom.

language.div: Engkau terima hormat dan mahkota, / di hadapan Kristus Sang Raja, / kau bersukacita bersama para kudus, / di Kerajaan-Nya.

text.language: ونلت كرامات وأكاليل من قبل الملك المسيح وفرحت مع جميع القديسين فى ملكوته.
